meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Pat DeVane Shayna Kravetz Matt Pressman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7098.

td.p: Pat DeVane, a graduate student originally from Wheaton, Illinois
Shayna Kravetz, an educator and writer from Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Matt Pressman, a graduate student in history from Somerville, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,800)

tr.td: LOVE THOSE ANNELIDS!
THE BUSINESS OF TECH
A HOST OF TV HOSTS
SCRABBLE PLAYERS DICTIONARY "G"
GET UP & DANCE!
ANAGRAMMED WORLD
(Alex: And there is a theme in [*], and if you discover it early on, it will help you.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'You\'re "engaged" if you know that annelids, or segmented worms, are divided into annulations, these shapes')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: You're "engaged" if you know that annelids, or segmented worms, are divided into annulations, these shapes
